description: Secure gateway proxy for internal financial information systems.

parsed_description.main: Retrieve stock aggregate data from Polygon.io API.
parsed_description.args: stock_ticker: Case-sensitive ticker symbol (e.g., 'AAPL'), multiplier: Size of the timespan multiplier, timespan: Size of the time window, from_date: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp, to_date: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp, adjusted: Whether results are adjusted for splits, sort: Sort results by timestamp ('asc' or 'desc'), limit: Maximum number of base aggregates (max 50000)
parsed_description.returns: Dict[str, Any]: Response data from Polygon API
parsed_description.raises: requests.RequestException: If API call fails after retries

from_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp
from_date.title: From Date

to_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp
to_date.title: To Date

adjusted.description: Whether results are adjusted for splits
adjusted.title: Adjusted

parsed_description.main: Format all fields from the Polygon.io stock aggregate response as a string.
parsed_description.args: stock_ticker: Case-sensitive ticker symbol (e.g., 'AAPL'), multiplier: Size of the timespan multiplier, timespan: Size of the time window, from_date: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp, to_date: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp, adjusted: Whether results are adjusted for splits, sort: Sort results by timestamp ('asc' or 'desc'), limit: Maximum number of base aggregates (max 50000)
parsed_description.returns: str: Formatted string containing all stock data

from_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp
from_date.title: From Date

to_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format or millisecond timestamp
to_date.title: To Date

adjusted.description: Whether results are adjusted for splits
adjusted.title: Adjusted
